subject: Bump to 4.3.30 - Fix CVE-2014-7186
commitMessage:
Bump to 4.3.30 - Fix CVE-2014-7186

Change-Id: Iabad82672d08ff0d67e763e031a533376d72fba8
Signed-off-by: John L. Whiteman <john.l.whiteman@intel.com>

comments.message: Uploaded patch set 1.
Patch Set 1: Verified+1 Code-Review+1

Patch Set 1:

This change is ok, but the upstream/4.3.30 is not at the right place: it should be on the tip of the upstream branch. I fix that before accepting the change.

Patch Set 1: Verified+1 Code-Review+2

verified build with gbs and upstream tag at the right position
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.
